channel.title: ~Story of my RS Life~
channel.description:
- - Story of my life - - I first started my journey across a trainstation, where I befriended a homeless man, who later on tought me the ways on using the cheap but useful Dragon Dagger (was only 30K), when I joined the Duel Arena team, I worked my way up with blood..sweat..and tears. While the richy duelers were laughing at me, waving their claws around and whatnot, I was getting stronger and stronger.....then one day, I had to go in a dueling match against one of them, who was blowing air off his gear, as if he's the best. I saved my dragon dagger for last, and used my abyssal whip to rough him up at first. I won't lie he was strong, strong as can be. Near the end, 23 HP he was gonna attempt to DFS spec me, but while he was charging it up, I was slicing him 4 (x2) times with my dagger. He fell to my feet to a 30K weapon, in his 40M gear. - - The End -
- - The Wild Trip - - I was in a 1v1 with another Level-124, his gear was..the common low-risker (or so I thought). Fighter torso, helmet of nietznot, rune platelegs, d boots, legends' cape, glory, rune defender, and abyssal whip. We kept fighting, back and forth. We kept healing all the time when we got down to 20-25 HP, safety reason :p. Near, when I was running out of food I wanted to end it quickly...so, I THEN DREW MY ARMADYL GODSWORD...but he drew his claws first. Next thing I know I'm in edgeville with no items. Goodfight.
-Got bored, so I wanted to write it, D:.-

There’s nothing to discuss except bad writing

item.title: ~Story of my RS Life~
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:9, topic:445341”]Now this is a story all about how
I walked right into varrok town
And I’d like to take a moment just sit right there
I’ll tell you all about how I rocked rs with no rares

On tutorial island, born and raised
In the rat pits is where i spent most of my days
Slashing em, shootin em, stabbin em all
And accidentally clicking into the walls

When a couple of noobs who were up to no good
Kicked me off to the lumbyhood
I killed one lil goblin
My health was scared
It said “we’re going to varrok where you won’t get impaired”

I asked for directions and a rich guy came near
He was wearing a phat and his name was fear
If anything I thought this dude rocks
But I said “naw screw it, yo to varrok!”

We pulled up to varrok about 4 mins later
He said don’t end up like the haters
I looked at the city and all it was
Now I could troll, just for the lulz[/quote]

By the 4th word I was reading that to the beat of the song.

Read full topic

item.title: ~Story of my RS Life~
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

This was pretty funny to read, if you’re going to create a story about your life on runescape at least put some more detail into it. Use a thesaurus to help you replace those poor choice of words with bolder ones or else it just feels like you’re reading some kid’s picture book.

Read full topic

item.title: ~Story of my RS Life~
item.dc:creator: @Dremora_Lore Dremora Lore
item.description:
@Dremora_Lore wrote:

    • Story of my life - -
      I first started my journey across a trainstation, where I befriended a homeless man, who later on tought me the ways on using the cheap but useful Dragon Dagger (was only 30K), when I joined the Duel Arena team, I worked my way up with blood…sweat…and tears. While the richy duelers were laughing at me, waving their claws around and whatnot, I was getting stronger and stronger…then one day, I had to go in a dueling match against one of them, who was blowing air off his gear, as if he’s the best. I saved my dragon dagger for last, and used my abyssal whip to rough him up at first. I won’t lie he was strong, strong as can be. Near the end, 23 HP he was gonna attempt to DFS spec me, but while he was charging it up, I was slicing him 4 (x2) times with my dagger. He fell to my feet to a 30K weapon, in his 40M gear.
    • The End -
    • The Wild Trip - -
      I was in a 1v1 with another Level-124, his gear was…the common low-risker (or so I thought). Fighter torso, helmet of nietznot, rune platelegs, d boots, legends’ cape, glory, rune defender, and abyssal whip. We kept fighting, back and forth. We kept healing all the time when we got down to 20-25 HP, safety reason :p. Near, when I was running out of food I wanted to end it quickly…so, I THEN DREW MY ARMADYL GODSWORD…but he drew his claws first. Next thing I know I’m in edgeville with no items. Goodfight.

-Got bored, so I wanted to write it, D:.-
